attributes.action: COMPLETE & TOTAL WITHDRAWAL from the E.U.
attributes.additional_details:
We, the British people are not getting anything approaching value for money within the EU. Our Parents and Grandparents were duped in to voting for what they thought was a trade agreement and subsequent generations have not been given a referendum (because politicians know exactly waht the British people will vote for).
End this farce, give fishing and farming rights back to British fishermen and farmers. Regain control of our own borders & laws and keep our Pounds Sterling for bailing out the UK and NOT for bailing out Greece, Eire or the rest of Europe.

Hold a proper unbiased referendum and then
GET THE UK OUT OF EUROPE!!
